data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coppard, Simon E., Noordenburg, Henk Van (2007): A new species of Lissocidaris (Echinodermata: Echinoidea: Cidaridae) from the Philippines: convergent evolution among smooth-spined cidaroids. Zootaxa 1493: 53-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176981
